content: To summarize, Q1 2022 was a great quarter with strong top line growth, notable new wins, including major buildings with repeat customers and some notable wins for the first time with new customers. Net cash used in operating activities of $71 million compared to $70 million in Q1 2021, reflecting higher costs associated with expanded product offering and increased factory capacity as well as expenses incurred as a result of the financial restatement and related work, offset by favorable working capital net cash outflows as compared to Q1 2021.
